cloudpayments.description: Booking tickets for an event on Leela.Game

texts.willRedirectYouToBooking: We're redirecting you to the booking details page.

startsAt.label: Offer date and time of the event
startsAt.help: Your timezone offset: GMT{{offset}} (if it's incorrect - please change the timezone in your personal settings). You can enter your local time in the field above. Other users will see the time adjusted according to their own timezone.

errors.unavailablePaymentMethod: This event has an unavailable for you payment method. You can change available payment methods in your personal settings.
errors.cantBookOwnGames: You can't book your own events.
errors.slotSalesNotStarted: Ticket sales for this event have not started yet.
errors.slotSalesAreFinished: Ticket sales for this event are finished!
errors.slotIsUnavailable: Booking for this event is unavailable
errors.slotIsUnavailableInYourCountry: This event has an unavailable for you payment method. You can change available payment methods in your personal settings.
errors.paymentIsUnavailable: At the moment, the event organizer can't accept payments. Please try again later.

options.world: EUR (Euro): credit/debit card issued outside of Russia
options.russia: RUB (Russian Ruble): credit/debit card issued in Russia

inquiry.beforeBooking: You don't pay anything yet. The event organizer will contact you to offer available date and time of the event. After accepting the offer, you will be redirected to the payment page.
inquiry.willOffer: organizer will offer you date and time of the event
inquiry.waitForOffer: Wait when organizer offers you available date and time of the event
inquiry.offer: The event organizer has offered you the following date and time of the event
inquiry.youRejected: You have rejected the offered date and time. You can talk to the organizer on the chat on this screen and arrange another time that suits you.
inquiry.youAccepted: You have accepted the offered date and time. Please finish the payment.
inquiry.youOffered: You have offered the following date and time of the event
inquiry.offerNotAcceptedYet: The buyer has not accepted your offer yet. You can offer another date in the form below.
inquiry.offerAccepted: The buyer has accepted the offered date and time. Please wait for the payment.
inquiry.offerRejected: The buyer has rejected the offered date and time. Try to offer another date.

errors.numTicketsUnavailable: Requested number of tickets is unavailable
errors.slotNotSelling: Event ticket sales are finished or not started yet
errors.currencyUnavailable: Price in requested currency is unavailable
